Hmm.... i think either we take in the `MAX_BLOCK_SIZE` constant (controversial) or we drop the comment.\n
Is this exposed via rpc? I always like to do `grep -r 'CONSTANT' bitcoin/` when touching a constant to see it's usage.\n

Maybe a link to https://github.com/jonasschnelli/bitcoin/blob/2015/11/doc_traffic/doc/reducetraffic.md (once it's merged) can be added here ? Something like "for more details on reducing traffic, see ...".\n
